comment.author: 45586426@N06
comment._content:
'Midnight Blue'  A3D-1 Skywarrior after making a touch and go landing on a Forrestal class carrier.
Possibly CVA-59 USS Forrestal in 1956 for the first A3D pilots to become carrier qualified.
Left side of nose of another A3D-1 Skywarrior in light 'gull gray and white with black nosecone
and side number 8. Possibly from VAH-1 'Smokin' Tigers'.
Note an early transportable version of either a Mirror Landing or Fresnel Lens Optical Landing system.
